response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I believe it would significantly enhance your endeavors or personal collection. After careful consideration, I am extending to you a special offer to purchase this product at a price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a strategic balance between fairness and maximizing the value I receive for such a valuable asset. I trust that we can come to an agreement that satisfies both our interests.", "product_price": 1200000}
